name: Isolation dissolve
description: I made this work to celebrate the end of the lockdown in the Netherlands and my personal isolation. You can see the Free Speech Flag waving through the window, there will always be freedom of movement on the internet. The work is also a reminder that some of us never make it out of isolation. The photograph is taken by me in an abandoned mental institution, the flag is designed by John Marcotte during the digital revolt in 2007.
